derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from modern Latin dinosaurus, from Greek deinos 'terrible' + sauros 'lizard'

entry.def: Dinosaurs were large reptiles which lived in prehistoric times.

entry.tran: 庞大臃肿的机构;过时的庞然大物
entry.def: If you refer to an organization as a dinosaur, you mean that it is large, inefficient, and out of date.

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous extinct terrestrial reptiles of the Mesozoic era
